RobloxAPIEnabledDatasources.description: The datasources that should be enabled and available.

RobloxAPIEnabledParserFunctions.description: The parser functions that should be enabled. Data parser functions cannot be enabled or disabled here, instead they are enabled if their corresponding data source is enabled.

RobloxAPICachingExpiries.description: The amount of seconds after the cache for a data source expires. '*' is a wildcard for all data sources.

RobloxAPIAllowedGroupIDs.description: The group IDs that are allowed to be used in the extension. If empty, all group IDs are allowed.

RobloxAPIAllowedUniverseIDs.description: The universe IDs that are allowed to be used in the extension. If empty, all universe IDs are allowed.

RobloxAPIAllowedPlaceIDs.description: The place IDs that are allowed to be used in the extension. If empty, all place IDs are allowed.

RobloxAPIAllowedUserIDs.description: The user IDs that are allowed to be used in the extension. If empty, all user IDs are allowed.
